QuestData.Title: A Cure from the Sea
QuestData.Description: You may not believe it, but seaweed is one of the most important gifts the sea grants to us. Without it, my tonic shall be useless.$b$bI know it is much to ask, but can you go into the harbor and collect some for me? The water is tumultuous in this trying time, but I will give you my blessing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Bunches of Seaweed from Harbor Seaweed.
QuestData.CompletionText: The sea cannot offer its guidance when it is in such pain. I feel as if one of my senses is blinded.
